results.title: The effects of beta 1-adrenergic blockade on the growth response to growth hormone (GH)-releasing hormone therapy in GH-deficient children.
results.text_hl: To determine whether chronic beta-blockade could enhance the growth-promoting effects of @GENE_GHRH @GENE_2691 @@@GHRH@@@ therapy, we conducted a double blind, placebo-controlled, randomized, cross-over trial of coadministration of the selective @GENE_BBS9 @GENE_27241 @@@beta 1-@@@antagonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ together with @GENE_GHRH @GENE_2691 @@@GHRH@@@ in 11 @<m>DISEASE_Dwarfism_Pituitary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004393 @@@GH-deficient@@@ children.

citations.NLM: Cassorla F, Mericq V, García H, Cristiano A, Avila A, Boric A, Iñiguez G, Merriam GR. The effects of beta 1-adrenergic blockade on the growth response to growth hormone (GH)-releasing hormone therapy in GH-deficient children. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 1995 Oct;80(10):2997-3001. PMID: 7559887
citations.BibTeX: @article{7559887, title={The effects of beta 1-adrenergic blockade on the growth response to growth hormone (GH)-releasing hormone therapy in GH-deficient children.}, author={Cassorla F and Mericq V and García H and Cristiano A and Avila A and Boric A and Iñiguez G and Merriam GR}, journal={J Clin Endocrinol Metab}, volume={80}, number={10}, pages={2997-3001}}

results.title: Atenolol enhances nocturnal growth hormone (GH) release in GH-deficient children during long term GH-releasing hormone therapy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ enhances nocturnal @GENE_GH1 @GENE_2688 @@@growth hormone@@@ (@GENE_GH1 @GENE_2688 @@@GH@@@) release in @<m>DISEASE_Dwarfism_Pituitary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004393 @@@GH-deficient@@@ children during long term @GENE_GHRH @GENE_2691 @@@GH-releasing hormone@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Martha PM Jr, Blizzard RM, Thorner MO, Rogol AD. Atenolol enhances nocturnal growth hormone (GH) release in GH-deficient children during long term GH-releasing hormone therapy. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 1990 Jan;70(1):56-61. PMID: 2104629
